x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: There are so many people who are completely new to volunteering, or donating to charity, or participating in activities/organizations that emphasize positive impact. The hardest part for some of these people exploring how to get started is simply choosing which activity or organization they should look into. These explorers could use a tech-focused tool that matches them or recommends to them activities/organizations that match their personality, their interests, their talents, etc.

How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  • Service Catalog Form
  • Table of events/orgs
  • Service Portal
  • NASK or an AI Agent to take all the form questions from a user and assess which event/org is best for the user

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • an instance with Generative AI capabilities
  • OR a connection to a third-party AI

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Maintenance of a database of events/orgs unless we can just pull from servicenow.org!
